mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bus_gout_enterprises( number_of_investment_projects, application_mode, former, now_changed, year_change, domestic_investor_name, organization_code_no, legal_representative, registered_capital, office_address, domestic_city, county, contact_name, contact_landline, contact_fax, contact_phone, contact_email, full_name_of_the_ultimate_parent, overseas_company_chinese_name, overseas_company_foreign_name, first_level_company_name, country_first_level_company_locates, overseas_investment_country, province, overseas_city, chinese_shareholder, chinese_equity_ratio, foreign_shareholder, foreign_equity_ratio, overseas_business_scope, overseas_enterprise_industry, total_investment, chinese_investment, foreign_investment, marketing_network, stimulate_exports, stimulate_imports, brand_acquisitions, obtain_brand_name, technology_research, technology_acquired, engineering_development, boosting_sales, resource_development, resources_back_shipments, resources_amount, resource_name, extension_of_industrial_chain, sketch, rests, payback_period, remark, accessory, order_by, CREATE_DATE, CREATOR, valid) values ( #{numberOfInvestmentProjects}, #{applicationMode}, #{former}, #{nowChanged}, #{yearChange}, #{domesticInvestorName}, #{organizationCodeNo}, #{legalRepresentative}, #{registeredCapital}, #{officeAddress}, #{domesticCity}, #{county}, #{contactName}, #{contactLandline}, #{contactFax}, #{contactPhone}, #{contactEmail}, #{fullNameOfTheUltimateParent}, #{overseasCompanyChineseName}, #{overseasCompanyForeignName}, #{firstLevelCompanyName}, #{countryFirstLevelCompanyLocates}, #{overseasInvestmentCountry}, #{province}, #{overseasCity}, #{chineseShareholder}, #{chineseEquityRatio}, #{foreignShareholder}, #{foreignEquityRatio}, #{overseasBusinessScope}, #{overseasEnterpriseIndustry}, #{totalInvestment}, #{chineseInvestment}, #{foreignInvestment}, #{marketingNetwork}, #{stimulateExports}, #{stimulateImports}, #{brandAcquisitions}, #{obtainBrandName}, #{technologyResearch}, #{technologyAcquired}, #{engineeringDevelopment}, #{boostingSales}, #{resourceDevelopment}, #{resourcesBackShipments}, #{resourcesAmount}, #{resourceName}, #{extensionOfIndustrialChain}, #{sketch}, #{rests}, #{paybackPeriod}, #{remark}, #{accessory}, #{orderBy}, NOW(), #{creator}, 1)
mapper.update: UPDATE bus_gout_enterprises set number_of_investment_projects = #{numberOfInvestmentProjects}, application_mode = #{applicationMode}, former = #{former}, now_changed = #{nowChanged}, year_change = #{yearChange}, domestic_investor_name = #{domesticInvestorName}, organization_code_no = #{organizationCodeNo}, legal_representative = #{legalRepresentative}, registered_capital = #{registeredCapital}, office_address = #{officeAddress}, domestic_city = #{domesticCity}, county = #{county}, contact_name = #{contactName}, contact_landline = #{contactLandline}, contact_fax = #{overseasCompanyChineseName}, overseas_company_foreign_name = #{overseasCompanyForeignName}, first_level_company_name = #{firstLevelCompanyName}, country_first_level_company_locates = #{countryFirstLevelCompanyLocates}, overseas_investment_country = #{overseasInvestmentCountry}, province = #{province}, overseas_city = #{overseasCity}, chinese_shareholder = #{chineseShareholder}, chinese_equity_ratio = #{chineseEquityRatio}, foreign_shareholder = #{foreignShareholder}, foreign_equity_ratio = #{foreignEquityRatio}, overseas_business_scope = #{overseasBusinessScope}, overseas_enterprise_industry = #{overseasEnterpriseIndustry}, total_investment = #{totalInvestment}, chinese_investment = #{chineseInvestment}, foreign_investment = #{foreignInvestment}, marketing_network = #{marketingNetwork}, stimulate_exports = #{stimulateExports}, stimulate_imports = #{stimulateImports}, brand_acquisitions = #{brandAcquisitions}, obtain_brand_name = #{obtainBrandName}, technology_research = #{technologyResearch}, technology_acquired = #{technologyAcquired}, engineering_development = #{engineeringDevelopment}, boosting_sales = #{boostingSales}, resource_development = #{resourceDevelopment}, resources_back_shipments = #{resourcesBackShipments}, resources_amount = #{resourcesAmount}, resource_name = #{resourceName}, extension_of_industrial_chain = #{extensionOfIndustrialChain}, sketch = #{sketch}, rests = #{rests}, payback_period = #{paybackPeriod}, remark = #{remark}, accessory = #{accessory}, order_by = #{orderBy}, UPDATE_DATE = now() ,UPDATOR = #{updator} WHERE ID = #{id}

UPDATE bus_gout_enterprises set
number_of_investment_projects = #{numberOfInvestmentProjects},
application_mode = #{applicationMode},
former = #{former},
now_changed = #{nowChanged},
year_change = #{yearChange},
domestic_investor_name = #{domesticInvestorName},
organization_code_no = #{organizationCodeNo},
legal_representative = #{legalRepresentative},
registered_capital = #{registeredCapital},
office_address = #{officeAddress},
domestic_city = #{domesticCity},
county = #{county},
contact_name = #{contactName},
contact_landline = #{contactLandline},
contact_fax = #{contactFax},
contact_phone = #{contactPhone},
contact_email = #{contactEmail},
full_name_of_the_ultimate_parent = #{fullNameOfTheUltimateParent},
overseas_company_chinese_name = #{overseasCompanyChineseName},
overseas_company_foreign_name = #{overseasCompanyForeignName},
first_level_company_name = #{firstLevelCompanyName},
country_first_level_company_locates = #{countryFirstLevelCompanyLocates},
overseas_investment_country = #{overseasInvestmentCountry},
province = #{province},
overseas_city = #{overseasCity},
chinese_shareholder = #{chineseShareholder},
chinese_equity_ratio = #{chineseEquityRatio},
foreign_shareholder = #{foreignShareholder},
foreign_equity_ratio = #{foreignEquityRatio},
overseas_business_scope = #{overseasBusinessScope},
overseas_enterprise_industry = #{overseasEnterpriseIndustry},
total_investment = #{totalInvestment},
chinese_investment = #{chineseInvestment},
foreign_investment = #{foreignInvestment},
marketing_network = #{marketingNetwork},
stimulate_exports = #{stimulateExports},
stimulate_imports = #{stimulateImports},
brand_acquisitions = #{brandAcquisitions},
obtain_brand_name = #{obtainBrandName},
technology_research = #{technologyResearch},
technology_acquired = #{technologyAcquired},
engineering_development = #{engineeringDevelopment},
boosting_sales = #{boostingSales},
resource_development = #{resourceDevelopment},
resources_back_shipments = #{resourcesBackShipments},
resources_amount = #{resourcesAmount},
resource_name = #{resourceName},
extension_of_industrial_chain = #{extensionOfIndustrialChain},
sketch = #{sketch},
rests = #{rests},
payback_period = #{paybackPeriod},
remark = #{remark},
accessory = #{accessory},
order_by = #{orderBy},
UPDATE_DATE = now() ,UPDATOR = #{record.updator}
UPDATE bus_gout_enterprises set VALID=0 ,UPDATE_DATE = now() WHERE ID = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT mna.* FROM mst_nation_area mna WHERE mna.parent = 1
SELECT mna.* FROM mst_nation_area mna WHERE (mna.`parent` = #{pid} OR mna.`id` = #{pid}) AND (mna.`city` IS NOT NULL AND mna.`city` <> '')
SELECT mna.* FROM mst_nation_area mna WHERE mna.`parent` = #{cid}
SELECT mxj.`json` FROM mst_xml_json mxj WHERE mxj.`code` = 'world'
SELECT mna.* FROM mst_nation_area mna WHERE mna.`id` = #{id}
